changes.change: Updating your route's settings no longer automatically updates your mapping version to the latest version. This is intended to be an explicit action.

Hidden map elements no longer toggle back on the moment you open another route. Mountable areas now stay hidden as a result and don't pop back up the moment you start editing a route. Mountable areas are now togglable in all map versions (view, edit, explore, live session), but are disabled by default.
